---
title: "Annotated Finemapping Results"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(stringr)
```

### Breast cancer

```{r}
top.snps.kable <- suppressMessages(vroom::vroom('../BRCA/BRCA_finemapped_L1_pip0.1_annotated.txt', delim = '\t', col_names = TRUE))
top.snps.kable <- top.snps.kable %>% replace(is.na(.), "") %>% mutate_all(str_replace_all, pattern=";", replacement=";\n")
```

```{r}
kableExtra::kable(top.snps.kable, format = "html", escape = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(column = 1:ncol(top.snps.kable), width_min = "10em") %>%
  collapse_rows(columns = 1) %>%
  row_spec(row = c(1:nrow(top.snps.kable)), extra_css = "border-bottom: 1px solid") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("basic","condensed"), full_width = F) %>% 
  scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "800px")
```
